website_summaries.verdict: 20 different cat toys to keep your felines entertained. Balls, mice, feather sticks, catnip sacks, and more. A great deal.
pros: With so many toys, you'll have replacements for the ones your cat inevitably swats under the furniture
Fun features: jingle bells, feathers, catnip
cons: Your cat might not enjoy all of the various toys but will likely find at least a few favorites

website_summaries.verdict: While this cat toy gift set includes a nice variety of toys, it also comes with some concerns.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for the 20 toys that include some infused with catnip
Large variety also includes some toys with feathers and some that rattle
cons: Safety concerns about some of the toys noted, including some with rope material that may unravel, and foam balls that can be torn and ingested by cats that tend to play vigorously

customer_reviews.title: Love my cat toys
customer_reviews.text: Grace is 13 weeks old. She loves her new toys and she loved using Amazon Prime! She was a little confused as to what to play with first so we put some away for later. Grace liked all the toys, even the little bag which I did not think she would like. All the toys are small enough for her to toss and carry around. Five of the toys have jingle bells inside the ball/toy or attached to the end of the feathery toy, so don't buy if your cat does not like jingle bells.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves her new little toys
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this! Not only was it a great deal, but there are 3 toys my cat goes CRAZY for. One of them she chases down the hall and back and puts in her water dish when she's done (which I read has something to do with her wanting to "secure" her hunted item). I even threw that same mouse into her toy box with a ton of different toys and she fished that one out of them all, carried it to me, dropped it at my feet, and meowed. (It's the toy in the attached picture) So yeah, this purchase was a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Amber from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kitten occupied for ages!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves these toys. Bought the set because he is always losing his toys, so a large pack means there are always at least one or two around. His favorite is the feathered fishing rod. It is the only toy that keeps him occupied for a long period of time without my active participation (i.e. I can actually get some work done). I just stick it between two of the couch cushions and he goes after it (note: carpet featured also purchased from Amazon!)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This assortment has a multitude of very small items, all of which include indigestible pieces and materials. Supervised play is highly recommended and I'd really only suggest these for very small pets. The few larger pieces I received did end up being the lot's only saving grace, those include the crinkle balls from and catnip fish. The majority of the bag consists of small foam/plastic balls and mice made of plastic or wicker covered in string. I'd be hard pressed to recommend this for anyone who has a pet with teeth.
customer_reviews.author: OverItTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My cats are completely in love with their new toys
customer_reviews.text: My cats are completely in love with their new toys! There is a little something for each of my 3 cats to enjoy and play with. The mother cat goes crazy for the shinny tinsel balls. One of my brother cats loves the nice and the other has a blast chasing the balls. Their new found play toy that they are obsessed with would by far have to me the feather cat dancer. The bell on it too is a plus for enticing them more.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Watt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES the long stick/ dangle toys it comes with. Out of all the other fun toys, he definitely prefers the specific one- dragging the end and rod with him countless areas of our home. You get a lot of toys for the 12 bucks! However I can only see him using half to its potential use. Toys are very cute :) worth buying if you feel the need to ever spoil your cat.
customer_reviews.author: Ni

customer_reviews.title: They Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cats can be challenging to please. This value pack of assorted cat toys is a huge hit! It's been over a month, and I still have not given all the toys in the variety pack to the cats. Like many others, the foam soccer balls were a favorite. Having the variety pack reminded me my cats get bored with the day to day toys and like to switch things up a bit. I toss out a few new toys and watch them play. There are many different sounds, textures, and movements in the collection sure to please even the most finicky of cats. The assortment is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: EllenTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great Assortment of Quality Fun Kitty Toys
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a 5wk old kitten abandoned on my porch by the feral mother cat. Once the kitten was strong enough he played constantly with these. The assortment is great for keeping a kitten entertained. He would get up during the night to play for an hour at a time. He carried the feather plumed mouse shaped toys around then cuddled them. He played fetch for as long as I’d indulge him with several of the more interesting balls. I fostered him for a month and all but the 2 straw toys were still in pristine condition. He went to his forever home with a pile of kitty loot.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Q-zy

customer_reviews.title: Best. Cat toy. Bundle. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I ever could have made. I have these toys littering my apartment like a bunch of round, non-lethal legos. My cat will randomly find one and play with it, providing hours of entertainment for my fur baby, myself, and all those who bask in his presence. The toy stick thing that comes with it is of excellent quality considering the price of this packet. The wire stick is so much better than one of those ratchet plastic stick things people normally get for their cat.
customer_reviews.author: Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Good for finding out what your kitty likes
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this expecting my cat to like everything, but instead bought it to see what types of toys she prefers (turns out she prefers the little catnip mice). If you're just looking for some toys for your cat to play with, I wouldn't recommend this unless you're doing what I did (finding out what they like), because it's very possible they won't like a majority of the toys (my male cats doesn't like any but the wand). I would recommend keeping what your cat likes and donating the rest to an animal shelter or foster home.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Not that I love it, My cat loves every single one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Not that I love it, My cat loves every single one of the toys that are in the package!! Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sun Kyung Kim

customer_reviews.title: For what it is, it's very good!
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, it's good. My kitten doesn't like ball toys, I discovered, so she ignored them completely meaning only about 5-6 of them got used intensely. But the toys were high quality for their price and it was a wide selection. It's one of those fun things for a new cat I think that gives you an idea of what kind of toy to invest in afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Only got 19 toys and 2 broke within hours.
customer_reviews.text: First off I only received 19 cat toys, the package was delivered around 2 today, my cat broke the string off the "I (heart) cats" toy in the first hour, and around 7 I found the mouse shaped ball completely unraveled. Not worth what I spent, even on prime day.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: 20 cheap cat toys for about fifty cents each
customer_reviews.text: 20 cheap cat toys for about fifty cents each. Not bad, most are *very* cheap (one looks like crumpled up wrapping paper), but some of them sell for two or three dollars (or more) in stores. The feather and bell on a wire is the favorite, and would seem to be the premium prize of the bunch. Oddly enough, the cat loves the little bag of "Catnip" as well, though I doubt it actually has any inside (more likely stuffed with polyester). Played around with most of them, though a few were withheld over safety concerns. Imagine they are all perfumed to smell like catnip. 🐱🐱🐱🐱
customer_reviews.author: My Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Nope, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Most of these toys are very poor quality. My 7-month-old kitten ripped most of these up in one day. That wicker ball was crushed and almost pulled apart when I opened the packet. Would definitely not recommend these and will never purchase again. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Choking Hazard
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality and the pieces are all made in China. Several of the toys were so small that they would pose a choking hazard - not only for my kitten but if my beagle were to get ahold of these toys by accident he could easily swallow them. Will be returning and will not be buying anything from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag of random fun, especially the wire wand
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved everything in this bag and it was nice to stagger out the toys and offer something new to play with now and then, one of my cats especially likes playing soccer with the toy balls so this was great for him. The cats and I especially loved the wire wand that came with this bag, it's much less tiring to use than a regular string wand since you just need to flick your hand to move the father ball around. Sometimes I just stick the wire wand in to the couch and just let the feather ball dangle in the air for cats to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kitty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this package as a gift for my African grey parrot. She was broody and feeling down because she laid an egg that can't hatch. She was fascinated with all the variety and has spent a lot of time looking each one over. I think it was a great purchase. We don't have a cat but I think cats especially kittens would love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Ravennann

customer_reviews.title: Just spend the money on higher quality toys at Petco/Petsmart.
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot of toys for the price so I was excited for my purchase to arrive but my cat didn’t really like any of them, except for one or two mouse ones. The balls and random things didn’t really interest my cat. They are pretty cheaply made too (not a surprise, knew this going into it) but when my cat only likes 3 out of the entire assortment, for the price it’s a ripoff. You’re better off spending the money on higher quality toys at Petco or Petsmart.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Lots of variety, but toys can be flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun little toys in this collection for my kitties! They LOVE the wand that came with it! And the little mice are their favorites. My only complaint is that the toys aren’t very strong, and come unraveled and shredded quickly. My one cat ended up unraveling all the string covering the blue and pink mouse and she swallowed about six inches of string before we caught her, which could have lead to her choking or other health problems had she been able to completely swallow it all.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: If I was a kitten this would be the best toy!
customer_reviews.text: Endless fun for my kitten. He especially likes the teaser with feathers & a bell attached to curved wire. I secured the handle so he could easily move it around at at touch. Each piece is different, he kind of becomes interested in new ones as he gets older. I just dropped everything out in an open area out of the way so he can choose any of them when he wants to practice "cat skills".
customer_reviews.author: diedrebird

customer_reviews.title: Abosolute favorite toy came from this!
customer_reviews.text: I threw a bunch of the toys on the floor and she played with each a bit but the one she loves is the wand I had one from pet smart she didn’t care for and the feathers fell out of another without a bell she kind of liked but the whole feather bunch completely fell off with very little use and this one which she loves and has taken so much abuse and holds together fine she drags this wand for the first floor on to an upstairs bed she loves it and from wherever comes rushing when she hears the bell
customer_reviews.author: My_Namma_Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pack of these toys for my cat when we were going to be away from home so he could have some variety to choose from. He loved the majority of the toys in the pack! I decided to get a second pack for him to have at home. Now, we've added 2 more kittens to our family, and they can't get enough of these toys. Some of the feathers do some out of the feathered toys, but that hasn't deterred my 3 felines in the least. They bat these around, chase after them, and attack them as if they were new each time. Occasionally I'll spray a few with catnip spray, and then there's even more enjoyment!
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: but his very favorite new toy is the wand with a feather thing ...
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain! We got this for our kitty for his 1st birthday-ish (shelter kitten) and he went NUTS when we started tossing him the toys. He loves balls and there are a ton of them in this package, but his very favorite new toy is the wand with a feather thing on the end. He goes completely nuts when we get this out. He has now decided to sit at the bottom of the stairs and meow until we go downstairs and play with this with him. What a spoiled baby! This pack of toys should easily last us a year but I think I will get another pack anyway, just in case they jack the price up.
customer_reviews.author: Jen D

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Such a great variety! I got the multi-pack because my one cat manages to lose all of the single toys I get her. The toys range in quality, but the higher quality toys alone make the product worth the purchase. Our package contained a nice wire "fishing pole" style toy with a feather on the end that our cat thoroughly enjoys and hasn't managed to destroy yet. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: tossed too many of these out - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the bag, I needed to throw away 2 toys that were coming apart. I bought this pack for 2 - 12 week old Maine Coon kittens, and WILL NOT let the babies have any of them for play without supervision. I just threw out another toy from the pack (this makes #6), because of the yarn unraveling. Gave 2 stars because there is a nice variety of toys; but could have given 1 star because variety is worthless if they are unsafe for kitty-play and are going in the trashcan. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: meepkat

customer_reviews.title: Remy the cat approved
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great value for the price! I love that this pack has everything from soft toys to hard toys. There's even a wand toy inside! I do have to replace the toys frequently as my younger cat loves to take everything we own and put it in water. Since they're so affordable I don't mind having to replace them often for the soft toys. Remy really enjoys his toys and always loves when we buy him more. His favorite is the fish in the picture which he also put in water.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Variety guarantees at least one of the toys will be chosen
customer_reviews.text: Cat owners know quite well that we will never know for sure if our cats will like the toys we chose. I have two cats and the only thing they agree on is fetching rattling toy mice. They LOVE them. I decided to give a go to this kit and it was a great decision. They have all sorts of toys and they all look cute, well put together and made. It's adorable to see them interact with new toys and I'm sure I'll buy from them again once these ones get destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Cat tested, owner approved.
customer_reviews.text: The cat I gave these to loves these. I don't get it, but she's happy, so whatever. We received: a small stuffed fish that said 'cat toy', a plastic fishing rod type thing with a toy, a crinkly mylar ball, several plastic cage balls with bells, several variations of mice, a tiny stuffed platypus, a woven hay type ball, and lots of balls. I am happy with the selection; we emptied the bag into the box these shipped in and the cat had a great time fishing all the toys out and playing with them. I think she liked getting 20 at once! For like $.60 a toy, it's hard to go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter-pack of cat toys!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my cat when I was going out of town overnight so she'd have a variety of new toys to play with. She's not really a "self-guided play" cat, but for the price, I figured it was worth taking a chance on this value pack. It's a good pack of toys! Only a few things have really caught her interest — like the stick with the feather on the end, which is exactly what I expected. The mousies and the crinkly ball also get some action on occasion. Overall, if you don't have a lot of cat toys and just want some more interactive elements around the house, this is a great place to start!
customer_reviews.author: almcd23

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the variety and amount
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value. It's hard to know what an individual cat is going to like so it's nice to have some variety. These are also the kinds of toys likely to get lost under or behind furniture so it's nice to have the plentiful variety. I think each pack must vary a little so don't expect to get exactly what you see pictured. I did not, but the variety of what I did get was probably even better. I can't promise that for you, but mine also included a wand toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen L. Marten

customer_reviews.title: occasional kitty entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Some are still in the packaging because I didn't want to run the risk of having all the toys out at once and either stepping on them, or all of them getting ruined quickly. It's been a few weeks now, and so far, none have been ripped apart yet (such as feathers). Some seem sturdier than others, but the foam soccer ball ones will probably be the first to meet their demise. The cats have other items to distract them, which is probably why these toys have lasted a month so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelynn

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL AND LARGE SET OF KITTY TOYS
customer_reviews.text: We just got two new kittens and toys can be pricey. THIS is a terrific value of a LOT of fun and good quality toys for them. The kittens love the toys and they are sturdy enough that they aren’t breaking them. Lots of fun things including balls, a dangler toy, birds, mice, etc for hours of fun play! I’m VERY pleased with my purchase and am grateful for your items. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: steamin

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves this pack of toys!
customer_reviews.text: This is more than just a starter kit everyone.. Take one or two toys out of the package every week OR spread them ALL across your home. ****One warning though: the white "cat nip sack" doesn't seem to actually have catnip in it. On top of that, it has a long string attached to it. I suggest cutting the string off or only have the toy available when you can actively supervise your cat playing with it. Too many stories of cats strangling themselves with toys like these****
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cats
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 young (almost 2 and almost 1) cats and they are loving this mixture. This is an awesome, affordable mixture of cat toys. Not every cat likes every toy but as far as I can tell, all of the toys we've let them have made at least one cat happy and each cat has at least 1 toy they really like. This is way better than the mixture I got at target for about the same price. One of our cats loves the wand toy so much that I stick the handle in the a drawer and she keeps coming back to play with it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Leila A. Sink

customer_reviews.title: Purrrrfect Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 week old kitten Maci loves the fountain. We use this in the kitchen and we keep a traditional water bowl near her food dish. It's very quiet, you can barely hear the pump inside. Great buy for kitties that love to drink flowing water. It seems good and sturdy too. I don't worry about her knocking it over.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think he would like the toys with bells in them as much but ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed with these toys. I kept about half because he loses them under our entertainment center and couch which I have to dig for every few days. I didn't think he would like the toys with bells in them as much but he ended up liking those the best. I can tell which ones are his favorite because those are the ones he loses first. I might get him another package for christmas since they come at random and I'm hoping for the fish catnip toy! He got a smaller orange one but he prefers bigger catnip toys it seems. Overall great purchase with great variety.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Krotz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the wand toy alone
customer_reviews.text: This pack is a great bang for your buck! Our cats constantly "lose" toys so I didn't mind paying $13 for 20 toys. I bought this a few months ago so most of the toys are lost by now (though they loved the catnip bags and crinkly balls) but I want to say that I plan on repurchasing this once the wand toy breaks. We have bought toys from Kong and Cat Dancer and we can't find a wand toy that keeps all 3 more entertained than the one that came in this pack. One of my cats will bring it to me and sit there until I play with it with him.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These were REALLY tiny toys and I was afraid to even let my cat play with them for fear he would choke. They also had feathers and bells attached to some that were not secured at all and came loose upon a little bit of play. I was also afraid that he would swallow those. I am throwing the whole lot away.....not worth risking my cat's health on these toys.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitty!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety in the bulk toy set! My kitty loves all of his toys and they keep him entertained for hours. The price is great for the amount of toys you get.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Love the Fishing Pole!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this college of toys. I thought it was a great price especially for what you received. In general, cat toys can be expensive even though they are always cheaply made. Our cat always loses them so I wanted to find a pack of multiple for a good price. I didn't read the full description before ordering so I didn't realize it came with a fishing pole (which my cat lives because of the feathers, bells, and beads at the end). The fishing pole is made different than most of the ones I have seen or purchased which I like. The pole bounces up and down easily without breaking easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but would check product for defects before giving to pet
customer_reviews.text: Bag had a good variety but one of the balls has a sharp/pointy part sticking out of it. It's not so sharp it would hurt you immediately but it could be dangerous to the cat/owner. Would recommend checking products received before giving them to your precious boy/girl.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia chaney

customer_reviews.title: Fun assortment. I can't tell who loves the toys more, my cat or grand daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of toys. My cat loves them and so does my grand daughter. She is holding one of the toys in her left hand while playing with Olive using the fishing pole, with her right. She is absolutely enthralled with all the feather toys. I highly recommend them for your cat (or grandkids lol).
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!  Great selection of toys!
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain! You receive 20 toys overall and the variety included is very good. My cats are enjoying most of them and the quality seems nice. As of this writing my cats are still enjoying these toys and they have withstood a good beating and remain in solid shape. We could not be more happier with this purchase. Money well spent! Buy this instead of purchasing toys one by one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I bought this for my cat cause she loves playing with toys. I have to say to be careful about leaving the wand out without supervision because it easily broke because my cat got ahold of it. the little feathers came off but I glued them back in. She still plays with it and loves it though. With the balls and mice they stay out so my cat can play with them. They are very durable and looks like she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Yzag

customer_reviews.title: Great for gauging a new cat's interests
customer_reviews.text: If your cat is picky like mine, toys are hit or miss. He loved all the balls and toys with bells in them, and ignored the crinkle toys and catnip mice completely. This package would be a great pack to buy when adopting a new cat to gauge what kinds of toys they enjoy, be it catnip mice, crinkle balls, feathers and bells, or the amazing wand toy that mine came with, which features a semi-stiff wire/string with a wad of feathers and a bell at the end, extending from a plastic pole. It mimics a birds movement, which really entices cats to jump and run after it. Overall a great deal for what you get. Especially for multiple cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that it's a grab-bag style assortment as then it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's a grab-bag style assortment as then it can be reordered for new, fun toys (of course this also means there's no guarantee you'll get a replacement of your cat's favorite should you need to reorder). You'll be hard pressed to find as many toys for cheaper of good quality. They stood up to the hyper active kitten very well, albeit they're no match for a dog (oops! Forgot to put them away when the dogs were out).
customer_reviews.author: R. Brasseurs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice variety for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: When we adopted our youngest kitty, I thought this might be a fun variety for him. Not only did he love them, but so did all the adult cats! I put them all in a large, flat basket, and they take out what they want to play with or roll around with it in the basket. When I round them all up and put them back in the box, it's like the first time they've ever seen them, and they go nuts for them again. I'd recommend this to anyone with kitties. It's got something for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Cat Lady Approved
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what the description states....a variety pack, and a quality one at that! Much better than those lil stockings you get from a big chain store. I enjoyed the novelty of many of the items, and the cats did too. Having multiple cats means each cat wants their own "special" toy at holidays, and this makes it easy and affordable to give them each several special toys, not just your garden-variety fuzzy mice. From rolly-balls to catnip toys, to interesting and unique items, this was a hit, so I definitely recommend, especially for multiple-cat households. Funsies!
customer_reviews.author: KitchenWitchTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love them!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I guess the kitties like these because as soon as I placed them in the toy basket, they were in there emptying it. The little foil balls are a big hit. I often place their toys back in the basket and wake up to toys all over the house the next day. Great value for all you get. Would buy again. Anyone who has a cat or cats understands why I came back to purchase for a second time! The love the toys! I'm sure I'll find the missing ones once I clean under the furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Teach4Peace

customer_reviews.title: GREAT price, good enough construction with minimal pieces to ...
customer_reviews.text: Sven loves these toys! I can't overwhelm him so he only has three out of twenty right now, but he loves them and won't stop playing with them. It's a blessing because now I can let my arms rest from playing with his one previous dangly toy on a string. GREAT price, good enough construction with minimal pieces to consume, and a great variety of different colors, shapes, and sizes. Be careful not to let the ones with bells sit around because it's annoying as hell to hear those bounce around when you're trying to sleep haha.
customer_reviews.author: Cordero Roman

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the package and my cats are going crazy. This is a terrific deal. The toys included are all well made and the same toys sell in stores for $2.99 and up each! Will definitely purchase tis product again. This is a great present for cat owners and for cats.

customer_reviews.title: Cat Absolutely Loves These Toys
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows just some of the toys because my cat loves them so much they are strewn all over the house. I occasionally find him past put in bed with one between his paws. Great product. The only thing bad is my cat loves to eat stuff so he did eat some of the feathers off of some of the toys and we had to watch out for some of the bells because we found teeth marks in those as well. Kind of a weird guy. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality toys for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I opened this pack how high quality these toys are for the very reasonable price I paid! I have 6 foster kittens, so I picked out a few of them (save the rest for the next batch) and threw them on the ground. So far, they especially love the rattle mouse with feathers! One of the kittens goes nuts with the crinkle ball. I haven't seen them play with the yellow jingle ball I put out, but it is in a different spot every time I walk in, so they must! I can update as I put more toys out in the future :)
customer_reviews.author: FishyBirdMLSTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: wonderful, wonderful variety and quality at the perfect price
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe my own reaction when I opened this delivery! I got so excited when I saw all the wonderful, interesting variety of items for my kitten to play with!! I've been buying cat toys for my new little kitty to play with since I adopted him 8 weeks ago so I know how expensive even 'dull' toys can be. The size and quality of these toys are perfect for a cat and the price is unbelievable. We had two small puppies visiting for a 'meet and greet' with my kitty a few days ago. They too enjoyed these toys - which held up very well during their play.
customer_reviews.author: irene dellaria

customer_reviews.title: Our 12 rescued indoor cats are very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 rescued indoor cats are very happy with these. We only put a couple out at a time so they haven't gotten bored with them. When one gets tired of whatever we put out, another picks it up. They all love the one on the stick, and we put the end of it in a drawer - they all swat it when they go by. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Great GrandmaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Have you seen a cat around here?
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats went absolutely bat-sh1t crazy when we opened the box with this bag of toys. We left the room and found one of the cats in the shipping box, tearing a hole in the bag to get to them. It has been a week, haven't seen the cats since.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Troutman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and Safe Variety.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Variety Pet Pack for Kitty Meow meows! I bought one for my brother after purchasing 2 for me. They're appropriately sized for all cats and not too heavy (playing fetch, you don't want to hurt your cat if they accidentally get hit in the face, some toys in stores I've seen are heavy and expensive that have no business in cats claws). I do think that pack compliments that Bergan Turbo Scratcher Cat Toy, very nicely. My cat loves that toy and all these toys. Good buy and will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great variety, but may need inspection.
customer_reviews.text: I like most of the toys in here and they are about 90% accurate to what you see in the picture. However i have to inspect a lot of them closely as they do not all look safe for a cat to play with (about 1/4 of the toys). Some will require supervised playing and storage afterwards. My cat hasn't shown any inclination to eat small objects and stuff, but some of the toys have things glued onto them which I removed anyway. My cat doesn't seem dumb but I have seen her try to eat little pieces of string, so i cut all of those off.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Cat unsure...
customer_reviews.text: These toys smell like rubber. Im hoping tjey air out. My cat loves the wand,but hasn't touched anything else yet.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. Now you do get what you pay for so keep in mind they are not anything spectacular. My kitten ruined a few of them within the first couple of days but the majority of them have held up for a couple of months and could definitely last a couple more months. Keeping in mind the price I think these are a good product and you don't have to feel so bad when your kitten chews one to pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Holly V.

customer_reviews.title: If your cat loves balls, they'll LOVE this toy set!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you do get plenty of toys. Paid about $13 for all of these cat toys. Only rating it 4 stars because some of the toys seemed pretty cheap and not really worth being part of this set. Like one of the "toys" is literally a jumbo glittery pompom you can get from arts and crafts stores. Another is just a cut up foam ball. One of the better toys is a cat wand with feathers and some fake mice. My cat unfortunately doesn't really like playing with balls much, only found out once I bought this. But if your cat is a ball lover, then this set is most definitely for you!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy O.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I have really finicky cats, very hard to please, I initially purchased this pack for the tumbler ball, because they already have most of the toys in the picture (and not have much interest in them) but it didn't come with the tumbler, so I have to spend extra money to buy one, and unfortunately my cats have no interests in the tumbler ball, either. Luckily, my cats like the two softballs in the pack, good enough for me! Haha.
customer_reviews.author: MustLoveCats

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for the Furbabies
customer_reviews.text: My 10-month old tuxedo kittens, Jack and Jill, have gone crazy over these toys. They have lots of toys, being very spoiled kittens, but they absolutely LOVE the feather on the wire. I've mounted it for them, and they go crazy batting away at it. And the love the little mice with the bells, as well as the bouncy balls. We've had hours of fun with them, after which they sleep very well! Good value for the joy it brought my babies.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Kmitch

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Toys — Good Variety in Pack
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this variety pack. I got it for my cats for Christmas, and it had some good quality toys in there, many that my cats really loved. Every once in a while I take a few more out, and the cats have something new to play with. I was afraid it would be all cheesy toys or boring toys, but the package I got had all good quality toys in it, and my cats have enjoyed the ones we’ve played with so far.
customer_reviews.author: reesah mouse

customer_reviews.title: Kitty is happy so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.text: Winnie loved every toy in the pack. Nothing went to waste. The best part is that none of these are filled with catnip so if your cat is like mine and doesn't like catnip (Winnie will ignore toys that smell like it) you don't have to worry about buying this mixed pack of toys. A few of them have a place to put catnip in if you would like. Great selection and great price. Exactly what I was hoping for! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love it, definitely buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The price is unbeatable for the number of toys you get. We tossed out 1 toy from this set because we were worried that our kittens might swallow the tinselly portions. Everything else was awesome especially the cat wand. Loved that it was made of wire since the movement really drove our kitties crazy wothour tiring out our arms. One of our kittens is IN LOVE with the cat wand and will drag it around the apartment with him. They have a great time playing with their varied collection of toys.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These toys are okay, although I do not think it is a great value. Many of the included toys sell for 25-50 cents at my local pet stores. The picture gives the impression that you get so many more toys than you actually get, although the description does accurately say you get 20. Search on Amazon and you will find other companies providing 30 or more pieces for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: MEK57Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ... to this set I found out that my cats love cushy toys a lot more than hard toys
customer_reviews.text: thanks to this set I found out that my cats love cushy toys a lot more than hard toys, and they don't like jingles. so it's a good set if you just got a cat and you're still trying to figure out what it likes. but honestly, I think I could have saved the money by buying an easyology kittystick, a few mice, balls and catnip from petstages. these items would have given me the same information about my cats without a lot of repeat toys. I mean seriously there were about 5 hard plastic jingle balls which my cats promptly ignore.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy catsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great toys to keep the feline busy!
customer_reviews.text: My cat sassy loves them her favorite toy besides the teaser is a animal printed plush ball with a feather on it She carries the thing around with her and grooms it on and off from attacking it. All the toys seem to be of good quality for a cat toy. Nothing was damaged upon receiving a package. The only thing that could have made it better is if it came in a box cats love boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a deal!! My cat is obsessed!!! All these toys would have cost me a fortune in the store. She is so excited! Tuckered herself out within minutes rolling around with the toys. Supposed cat nip toy doesn't seem to actually have cat nip in it though. Oh well! The feather dancer is pink themed, which I don't think I planned. But it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: CAT LOVES THE FEATHER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year or two ago and my cats favorite toy is still that silly pink feather on the stick. The feather HAS NOT COME OFF. HOW IS THIS POSSIBLE?!?!?! She is a crazy biting swatting cat, and the feather is holding on to the end of that stick. A few of the other toys are still around too, and she will play with them every now and then :)
customer_reviews.author: tmtatum

customer_reviews.title: Decent value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a low cost lot of cat toys, so I expected that the quality of the toys would also be low. Overall it’s a decent buy for the price, not too stellar, but not too shabby either. I tossed about 1/3 of the toys directly from opening the package because I considered them to be unsafe for the cats. The other 2/3 still made a good value for the lot price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth FreilichTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I loved a majority of these toys for my cats in ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved a majority of these toys for my cats in terms of safety, price and variety. My cats were particularly fond of the teaser toy with the feather and the balls with bells in them. However, as another reviewer mentioned, there are some toys made of material that can be easily scratched or bitten off and ingested. My cats did shred and no doubt ingested some of the material from the toys in question and they have since been taken out of rotation. The rest are holding up great and are really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, each is very small.
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a 1.5 pound kitten so I wanted toys that were size appropriate for the short term and some that he could grow into. These are all small-- so small that some could be a choking hazard for a baby or dog, so you want to keep that in mind if you buy this. But they are all very cute, and work as short-term toys. None of them will last forever, but it is great to buy some toys in bulk that I can give to my kitten periodically.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Reduced our kittens unhealthy pounce and claw play!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome deal. Great variety and perfect amount. At first I thought about only putting out a few and then put out more when kitten get bored but got excited and put them all out. I spread them around the house and it's reduced the amount our new kitten tries to pounce on us or dig his nails into our toes in passing. We received toys that were both in and not in the picture -all great. The only thing my kitten doesn't seem to care too much about is the balls but my child loves them ha! Thanks for making a great variety pack at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: JasmineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: kittys loved these
customer_reviews.text: So many different toys to choose from. The kittys loved this, and the box it came in :)
customer_reviews.author: gwilliams

customer_reviews.title: SUPER GOOD DEAL
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good deal! So many pieces come in this pack and my cat plays with all of them. I pull out a few toys at a time and just noticed last night that there is a toy not pictured here. It's one of those wands you hold with a feather at the end, which is something else I had been looking for. I was happy to find it was included in the package and it is his favorite toy. Couldn't be happier and will probably buy another pack.
customer_reviews.author: mailegirl

customer_reviews.title: Fun little pack
customer_reviews.text: Fun little pack. Affordable and while the toys won't last a real long time, it's a good buy. As one gets torn apart, or stolen by my dogs, I just replace it with a different one. I wish more of the items didn't have bells inside them <don't want my dogs eating a bell> but my cat likes them. The only one that arrived in squashed shape was a single woven rattan ball. It was kind of already falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L.

customer_reviews.title: The stick...
customer_reviews.text: In this package is a wand toy with feathers on it... it is by far my kittens' favorite thing. I cannot tell you how many times I have woken up with that jabbing me in the back because they brought it upstairs to bed... the other toys are great and they play with then, but that feather stick thing man... they cant get enough of it...
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mattner

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit with my Senior Rescue Kitties!
customer_reviews.text: Just rescued two senior kitties from the animal shelter yesterday and these arrived today. We previously had a pet-free home and I desperately needed toys for them but was uncertain which kinds to get or what they might like because their files were fairly vague. This variety pack solved that problem for me and the toys that arrived were high quality and varied a lot. The cats LOVE their new toys! It was a huge hit! I'm so very pleased and would definitely recommend this pack and seller to anyone unsure of which toys to get their feline fur-babies. Arrived a day early, too!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: I received these toys yesterday (I would note that due to COVID-19, shipping was delayed. Not an issue for me but if you are on a time crunch, take note) and my cat loved them! I am planning to cycle through 3-5 every week to keep them lasting longer and keep my cat from getting bored. He LOVES the mouse with a feathered tail and a feather wand that comes with this! As with any cat toys, especially if you have a rough cat, they're not super durable. But for the price and the variety I don't see it as an issue! I will be repurchasing when he needs new toys.
customer_reviews.author: Aleesha Griffin

customer_reviews.title: not everything in the picture comes in the bag
customer_reviews.text: my cats really like the catnip mouses tucked inside the wire ribbed ball -- i had picked them up one at the dollar store once before: they can't get to the mouse, the toy is light weight so they can chase it around all night, and it makes noises when it rolls that they seem to like. but even tho its in the picture, it didn't come in the bag that was delivered. there are other good toys included tho and the value is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: L D

customer_reviews.title: PURRRFECT!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best thing ever for kittens and cats! The packaging was cute and professional, and came with a perfect variety of toys so that your fur babies have a selection to choose from. I pulled them out and spread them over the floor and the kitties picked and choosed which ones they wanted to play with. Definitely would recommend and i would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: very nice strong toys in this bag my 4 month old kitty loves them all. I've only used about half the toys so far including the 2 wands the catnip fish and the feather wand. I also bought a DA bird and cat dancer toy as the main big wands and use these to throw if the cat wants variety. Only downside is my kitty gets a lot of the little balls and mouses stuck under the couch and they get lost until I move and search for them lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 bags and cats love them ----some other cat toys purchased recently are still waiting for cats to show interest . I should have stuck with these tried and true rodent like toys. Also no one pays me or provides exotic dancers , discounts or freebies for positive reviews but for a gift certificate to KiKi's massage parlor I would give 5 Stars to " Lawn Darts " . This in the interest of full disclosure and Situational Ethics.
customer_reviews.author: White Lives Matter Bezos

customer_reviews.title: Jackpot of Toys
customer_reviews.text: I figured this variety pack would be alright to start me off after adopting a cat from the rescue - but I didn't have high expectations. To my surprise this was the jackpot. My cat loves several of these toys and I have toys to spare. Mine also came with one of those long bell and feather wires to keep my cat fit jumping for it. I actually just stuck it between some crates at about waist level and she will randomly go play with it in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: JAMESON

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty nice grab-bag of random stuff
customer_reviews.text: My cats would have written this review, but they are too busy playing with the toys, so I'm doing it. It's a pretty nice grab-bag of random stuff. Quality is okay, but let's face it. It's cat toys: it's not like they'll live forever.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Stojic

customer_reviews.title: Stepdad Loved It
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my step dad for Christmas and he loved it. We are going to make a mount for him so he can put it on the tractor for those really hot days. He will be able to use it for multiple things.
customer_reviews.author: christy canaday

customer_reviews.title: Good variety to see what your cat likes
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety , my cat didn’t take to all or them but the ones she did she loves and a lot of these toys you can’t find in a pet store. There’s great creativity put into them. I stored away most and will slowly cycle them to keep the novelty alive.
customer_reviews.author: Nicrostar

customer_reviews.title: Good assortment but low quality
customer_reviews.text: Lots of balls with bells, but one broke open first time playing with it. There are also some weird cheap squeeze ball type toys that I'm afraid to give to my hamb in case he decides to tear it to pieces and consume it. Not indestructible but in a pinch, you can use most of the toys.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: My cats go crazy for these toys!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this package of toys for my cats as their Christmas present (yes we are those pet owners that give gifts to their pets). Holy night! These toys have been through a lot in the last 8 months but still are able to withstand the wrath of 3 young kitties. The wand toy is by far a crowd favorite in my household. So much so, we've woken up to that thing in our bed! 10/10 would recommend! Great bargain too!
customer_reviews.author: Ann_Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good selection of cheap toys
customer_reviews.text: Enough toys to keep your kitten busy, they're all mega cheap - but then my cat is often more interested in bits of plastic wrapping or pieces of paper. This is a cute set, guess it's worth the money if you're in a shopping mood.
customer_reviews.author: Rice

customer_reviews.title: A couple bad toys but mostly good!
customer_reviews.text: Good variety of cat toys! My youngest likes the teaser wand in particular. I've got to have that one hidden away or she'll rip out the feathers. There were two foam balls that I am going to throw away. They felt extremely cheap and one of them (the soccer ball) was coming apart a bit already. Not pictured: the teaser wand that i am hiding for its safety, and a little bell ball that one of my cats immediately hid.
customer_reviews.author: ponibutts

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Wish the toy with the stick was ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Wish the toy with the stick was of higher quality though, it’s flimsy. But apart from that; this is a really great value! My new 7 month old kitty loved all of the toys, I see him play with all of them. He just has so much fun :) I’ll definitely buy again and recommend this set <3 And I will up the review to 5 stars if you can offer a higher quality stick, I’d pay an extra dollar or so too if the stick was of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: iAmStevin

customer_reviews.title: Your kitties will thankyou!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this exact pack for my cats each Christmas and wrap em individually kinda a tradition of mine lol my cats love the rubber balls the most and the toy on the wire and the mice .. December is coming I'll be purchasing another one maybe 2 bc we rescued a new kitten who loves the remaining toys we have 😻
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: An instant hit!
customer_reviews.text: Yara (my 6 month old cat) loved these toys so much. We played with the feather wand for about 20 minutes and could have gone longer but she literally was so worked up/excited she started panting so I wanted to cool her down. So many different toys you're bound to find something you cat likes!
customer_reviews.author: Kuticle Pressons

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Has a little bit of everything making it easy for the three cats in my house to share. One of the cats is a kitten and has yet to destroy any of the toys, so I would say they’re pretty durable!
customer_reviews.author: Becca R.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quantity
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pet sitter and I like to give my clients some goodies for Christmas as a thank you. This pack makes that doable for me. There are lots of cute cat toys to choose from and they are much less expensive then buying them from a pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Major

customer_reviews.title: Good variety...great value!
customer_reviews.text: Cat toys probably end up the same place as missing socks. I was tired of spending $2-$4 per toy only to have them disappear after a few days. This little variety pack has a nice selection of the same kind of toys you can find in the individual bins at the pet store. But for a LOT less. It's also fun to swap out toys regularly, to keep the cat entertained. :)
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

product_meta.title: Fashion's Talk Cat Toys Variety Pack for Kitty 20 Pieces
product_meta.description:
Toys might be different from the picture.Based on customer considerations,some of the toys in this package will be updated from uncertain timing.possibly different from the pictures.


Contains Assorted 20 toys.


Mouse,Balls,bell,atnip,Mylar Balls,feathers,Teaser-Cat and more.
feature_bullets: Keep your cat busy when you are away.
Give your cat a way to release his energy with this combo pack of entertaining toys. Featuring feathers, balls and catnip, mice and more this pack is the perfect choice for your furry friend.

Contains small ball,Always supervise your pet when playing with toys.This toys is strong but not indestructible.Do not allow pets to play with broken or damaged toys!For play only. Not a child''s toy. Toy should be removed and replaced if excessive wear or damage occurs.
Holiday, birthday or everyday, this cat treats/toys gift set is just what your kitty ordered.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
